original_title: Kid Dynamite: Four Years in One Gulp
overview: Four Years in One Gulp is the vibrant 90-minute documentary of the all-too-brief life and times of KID DYNAMITE. Between 1997 and 2000, this Philadelphia band changed the face of modern hardcore with their poignant and passionate sing-a-long anthems.
title: Kid Dynamite: Four Years in One Gulp
